summary:
We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Must not list method names verbatim. Focus on class responsibility and state/behavior. Provide English.

Class: Kosmos2VisionConfig. It's a configuration class for vision encoder of Kosmos-2 model. Stores hyperparameters like hidden size, intermediate size, number of layers, attention heads, channels, image size, patch size, activation, layer norm epsilon, dropout, initializer range/factor. Inherits from PretrainedConfig. Used to instantiate vision encoder with specified architecture. Business intent: define model architecture for vision component of multimodal model, enabling customization and reproducibility. Keywords: configuration, vision encoder, transformer, hyperparameters, Kosmos-2, model architecture, image size, patch size, attention heads, hidden layers, activation function, initialization, dropout.

Make summary concise: "Configuration class that encapsulates all hyperparameters needed to build the vision encoder of the Kosmos-2 model, allowing users to specify dimensions, layer counts, attention settings, image and patch sizes, activation functions, normalization, dropout, and weight initialization."

Business intent: "Provide a flexible, reproducible way to define and instantiate the vision part of the Kosmos-2 multimodal model, supporting default settings matching the pretrained checkpoint and enabling custom configurations for research or deployment."

Keywords list.

Return JSON.

Make sure no markdown. Use double braces? The instruction says Output ONLY valid JSON starting with {{ and ending with }}. Example: {{"summary": "...", ...}}. So they want double curly braces? Actually JSON normally uses single braces. But they say start with {{ and ending with }}. So we need to output double braces. Provide exactly that.

Let's craft.

{
"summary": "...",
"business_intent": "...",
"keywords": [...]
}

But with double braces: {{"summary": "...", "business_intent": "...", "keywords": [...]}}

Make sure quotes inside.

Let's produce.

Keywords list: ["vision encoder", "configuration", "transformer", "hyperparameters", "image size", "patch size", "attention heads", "hidden layers", "activation function", "initialization", "dropout", "Kosmos-2"]

Now produce final JSON.assistantfinal{{"summary": "A configuration class that encapsulates all hyperparameters required to construct the vision encoder of the Kosmos-2 model, including dimensions, layer counts, attention settings, image and patch resolutions, activation, normalization,
